form:FormGroup.label: Remember Notifications
form:FormGroup.helpText: If ticked, the column values from de-duplicated notifications will be stored in the duplicated check store so they can be viewed.

form:FormGroup.label: Suppress Duplicate Notifications
form:FormGroup.helpText: If ticked, notifications that are identical (across the configured columns) to ones previously sent will be suppressed. This relies on notification values being stored in the duplicate check store.

form:HelpHTML.p: If ticked, enter the column names in the Columns field to define which columns will be used for de-duplication of notifications.
Note: Any change to the columns used for de-duplication will require the duplication store to be cleared.
A comma delimited list of column names (case-sensitive) that should be used to de-duplicated notifications.
Note: Any change to the columns used for de-duplication will require the duplication store to be cleared.
